title: AI-Enhanced Remote ICU Patient Monitoring System
description: "Vital Care", A comprehensive ICU patient monitoring system designed for real-time tracking and alerting of critical patient conditions in ICU settings using the NEWS2 scoring system and rule-based alerts.
features: Real-time vital sign monitoring alerting based on predefined thresholds
Automatic classification of patients into risk categories (Low, Medium, High) using NEWS2 scoring
Role-based views for doctors and nurses
Automated customizable alert system for critical and borderline vital signs
Note-keeping and patient discharge functionality
Data visualization with chart and table views for vital sign trends
This was done for my final year research project and got selected for the TIDAC research symposium 2024 at NSBM

title: Medical Laboratory Management System
description: A comprehensive web-based management system developed for Medisense Laboratory Pvt Ltd, designed to streamline and automate operations across all departments of the laboratory.
features: Cashier and reception management
Doctor and patient record management
Separate modules for mini lab, main lab, and x-ray processing
Test result management and reporting
Customer and agency management
User role-based access and permissions

title: Vehicle Renting Website
description: "Burgeon Tours", A responsive website for booking vehicles for trips, with automatic cost estimates based on start and end locations using Google Maps APIs.
features: Vehicle booking for trips and journeys
Cost estimation based on location inputs
Inquiries and messaging about rides
Fully mobile-responsive design

title: Vehicle Inspection System
description: A web-based application used by "Green Light", a vehicle inspection company, to record detailed inspection results for each vehicle part, generating comprehensive reports on the vehicle's overall condition.
features: Detailed part-by-part inspection recording
Automated report generation on overall vehicle condition
Searchable inspection history for past records
User-friendly interface for inspectors

title: Supercar Store Platform
description: "Luxury Rides", A comprehensive web-based platform for a supercar store, including a client-facing website for browsing available cars and a management system for store operations.
features: Client website to view available supercars and specifications
Email-based inquiry system for clients
Store management system for CRUD operations on car listings
Real-time updates between client website and management system
Inquiry response functionality for store owners
